originalText.text: Completely agree with Luke’s review.  They want your BANK ACCOUNT LOGIN Info, payroll login and permission to use your biometric data for 3 months for them AND their (undisclosed) partners, for guarantors and applicants.  I can’t imagine this is safe.  Do not recommend at all.  Use at your own risk.

text.text: Completely agree with Luke’s review.  They want your BANK ACCOUNT LOGIN Info, payroll login and permission to use your biometric data for 3 months for them AND their (undisclosed) partners, for guarantors and applicants.  I can’t imagine this is safe.  Do not recommend at all.  Use at your own risk.

originalText.text: They work with fake rental scammers, allowing them to steal application money. Vero does not do any verification of the companies they work with and has no method for punishing or removing scammers. Past that, they want the login info to your bank and disability, which is a potential liability nightmare (and possible HIPAA violation) and does not pull the correct information. Stick with delivering your stuff in person and avoid rentals using this system.

originalText.text:
I am moving all of our 20,000-plus residential apartment homes over to Vero. The cutting-edge technology and the user experience seem to be unparalleled.

The sales and implementation team have been fantastic, and I could not be more pleased with how the team interacts with our team. Great work!

originalText.text: I was able to apply to an apartment start-to-finish in under 10 minutes. No more taking blurry pictures of bank statements or offer letters. Vero made it so easy!

text.text: I was able to apply to an apartment start-to-finish in under 10 minutes. No more taking blurry pictures of bank statements or offer letters. Vero made it so easy!

originalText.text: The apartment search process in Manhattan is nothing short of a headache. If it wasn't for Vero, I would've moved by now. Vero made everything easy and simple. Not to mention the plethora of well trained and helpful employees.
